text: when I was in high school I used to work
at this summer stock theater and one of
the best things that I used to get when
I was there was this strawberry mint
lemonade that they sold at the
concession stand today I'm bringing back
those memories by making my own
strawberry lemonade and just for a
little bit of extra aromatic flavor I'm
adding one lime sliced I do have six
lemon sliced this kind of lemonade is
like a macerated lemonade instead of
taking juice and mixing it with sugar
and water I'm gonna mash my lemons and
limes and strawberries together with
some sugar and then add my water and let
it steep kind of like tea and you're
gonna be surprised I think at the great
flavor that you get from the zest of the
lemons and the limes so add your
strawberries lemons and limes to a tall
pot and then add 3/4 of a cup of
granulated sugar and then start mashing
what you're looking to do here is get
all of the juices running and the
flavors melding together you just want
to do it until everything is nice and
broken down it could be up to five
minutes guess it depends on how much
elbow grease you want to put into this
recipe so you can see now the juices are
coming out and everything starting to
meld together you can add your water now
six cups of cold water this should sit
for 30 minutes you don't want to let it
sit to too much longer because there is
the peel and there it could get a little
bit bitter so give yourself about thirty
minutes and then come back now all
that's left to do is strain and drink
I'm gonna use my ladle because I don't
want to splash myself once you've
strained your lemonade you can keep it
in the refrigerator for you know a day
or two and it will be fine
press on the solid so as much juice gets
through as possible isn't that a
gorgeous color so vibrant it's like a

pitcher you can fill your picture with
ice but I
easier to pour into an ice-filled glass
I for one cannot wait to try it
and if you wanted to make this alcoholic
just throw a little bit of vodka in
there and I think you will really really
love it
fragrant beautiful strawberry lemonade
with a little mint garnish
so refreshing
